fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Fire a tear at someone, attacking them
-(Familiar) Target a player. Any attacks dealt to that player are increased by one tier

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-As the lead, you will get a permanent increase in damage for every 2 attacks you are dealt and survive
-In your familiar form, you have no defense
Damage: 1 (Basic)
Range: 5
Luck: 0%
